trails.name: Little Scraggy Trail Loop
trails.summary: A great, new flow trail at Buffalo Creek, which combined with Nice Kitty is a BC classic ride.

trails.name: Buffalo Creek Big Loop - IMBA EPIC
trails.summary: A nice tour of some of the best of Buffalo Creek - mostly smooth singletrack with some climbing.

trails.name: Buffalo Creek Loop - Pine Lake Trailhead
trails.summary: A nice tour of popular Buffalo Creek trails on the NW side of the area - from Pine Lake Park.

trails.name: Centennial Cone
trails.summary: One of the better beginner/intermediate rides in the front range.

trails.name: Betasso Preserve
trails.summary: A solid ride close to Boulder that is often ridden from town.

trails.name: Apex Park Tour
trails.summary: This technical front range ride is only possible on even numbered days but it's worth the planning!

trails.name: Staunton State Park - Full Clockwise Loop
trails.summary: A very fun, reasonable tour with beautiful scenery and perfect mix of cross-country and downhill.

trails.name: North Table Loop
trails.summary: Big climbs. Rowdy descents. Amazing 360-degree views.

trails.name: Lair O' the Bear - Bear Creek Trail
trails.summary: Mostly flowy singletrack, with a few small climbs and some very fun rock challenges.

trails.name: Hall Ranch
trails.summary: A favorite for Boulder area riders - scenery, singletrack, technical sections...  it's got it all!

trails.name: Mini-Tour of Buffalo Creek
trails.summary: A 15-mile loop of some of the best trails Buffalo Creek has to offer.

trails.name: White Ranch: Technical Descent Tour
trails.summary: A tour of the southern half of White Ranch's best features.

trails.name: Keystone Gulch to Soda Creek Loop
trails.summary: A moderate dirt road climb leads to a sustained, scenic, fast singletrack tour of Soda Park.

trails.name: Kenosha Pass to Georgia Pass and West Jefferson
trails.summary: One of the best rides in the mountains within one hour of the Front Range!
trails.conditionDetails: Dry, Fallen Trees - There are a couple fallen trees when you branch off the Colorado Trail. Besides that it's smooth sailing. No snow anywhere on the trail

trails.name: USAFA Falcon Trail
trails.summary: Some of the best in-town singletrack in Colorado Springs.

trails.name: Galena Gulch to Colorado Trail - West Ridge
trails.summary: Excellent singletrack riding with a balance of contoured flume riding, climbing and sweet descents!

trails.name: Alderfer/Three Sisters/Dedisse Tour
trails.summary: A tour of some pretty decent singletrack through the Dedisse and Three Sisters parks.

trails.name: Deer Creek Canyon
trails.summary: A technical downhill earned the Colorado way.

trails.name: Walker Ranch
trails.summary: A classic loop near boulder with a nice mix of technical riding, flowy descents, and scenery.

trails.name: Dakota Ridge / Red Rocks Loop from Zorro Trail
trails.summary: A great winter or after work ride.  Fast, technical and exciting.

trails.name: Blue Sky to Indian Summer
trails.summary: A short and casual ride, perfect for those after-work excursions.

trails.name: Ridgeline Open Space
trails.summary: Great rolling singletrack with tons of options for short and long loop rides.

trails.name: Blue Grouse - Mule Deer Loop

trails.name: Hidden Mesa
trails.summary: A nice short lollipop ride with great front range views and fun rock features to try your skills on.

trails.name: Picture Rock/Wild Turkey Loop
trails.summary: A combination of a few of the best intermediate trails in the Boulder/Lyons area.

trails.name: Marshall Mesa - Doudy Draw Loops
trails.summary: A nice ride close to Boulder - great views and a nice ride for advanced beginners or intermediates.

trails.name: Rampart Reservoir Trail

trails.name: Spring Brook Loop

trails.name: Heil Ranch
trails.summary: A good intermediate ride relatively close to Boulder, with many options for linking to other trails.

trails.name: Phillp S. Miller Park / Miller Activity Center (MAC)

trails.name: Green Mountain Intermediate Loop
trails.summary: A quick loop of Green Mountain from the West parking lot off Rooney Road.

trails.name: The Divide Trail/Mountain View

trails.name: Dirty Bismark
trails.summary: A fun Boulder area cruise following the famous Morgul Bismarck road course.

trails.name: Soda Park Loop

trails.name: Elk Meadow & Bergen Peak Loop

trails.name: Indian Creek Loop - Trail #800
trails.summary: A beautiful wooded loop with great singletrack and a few linkup options for those warm summer days.

trails.name: Ginny Trail via Powerline Trail

trails.name: Elk Meadow/Bergen Peak Loop

trails.summary: A great after work flowy/technical singletrack ride with amazing views of Horsetooth Reservoir.

trails.name: Chaco's TenFoot Loop

trails.name: Twin Lakes Trail
trails.summary: A nice trail around beautiful Twin Lakes.

trails.summary: North Table Mountain's best loop - the linkup provides the mesa's best singletrack

trails.name: Ape' Ney (Apex to Chimney)
trails.summary: A climb up the Apex system with several challenging tech sections followed by a long and fast, flowing descent.

trails.summary: A loop ride from town to the historic Baker's Tank.

trails.summary: A whole lot of climbing.

trails.summary: A newer addition to North Table Mountain provides a fast non-technical downhill option.

trails.name: Valley Loop Trail
trails.summary: An easy pedal to get you to the good stuff.

trails.name: X10U8
trails.summary: A fun, technical, purpose built trail.

trails.name: Spring Brook Loop North
trails.summary: A fun twisty trail through the woods, opening up into majestic views across plains to the Flatirons.

trails.name: Cruel and Unusual
trails.summary: Another one of Trestle Bike Park's expert-only trails full of berms and built features.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - Dusty but great day with Brett and Aaron

trails.name: Renegade
trails.summary: A fun, twisty, challenging route through scrub oak.

trails.name: Small Slopestyle
trails.summary: The smallest slopestyle line at Valmont.

trails.name: No Quarter
trails.summary: This is a fun filled trail featuring wooden drops, sculpted berms and fun dirt jumps.

trails.name: BEALL UCANBE
trails.summary: An expert downhill trail with drops and jumps galore.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - Dusty but great day with Brett and Aaron

trails.name: High Lonesome Trail
trails.summary: A very rocky, rooty, and steep trail. Excellent views of alpine fields surrounded by the divide.

trails.name: Tipperary
trails.summary: A steady climb or fast descent with forest and meadows.

trails.name: Ponderosa
trails.summary: A short trail with a decent climb and descent.

trails.name: Pleasant Pass
trails.summary: A fun, rolling singletrack alternate downhill from the top of Hidden Mesa.

trails.name: East Valley Trail
trails.summary: Easy riding on flowing singletrack in the valley.

trails.name: Upper Flume Trail
trails.summary: Fun, flowy singletrack follwing an historic flume.

trails.name: Blue Trail
trails.summary: Plenty of natural jumps built in with some nice bermed turns.

trails.name: Shorthorn Trail
trails.summary: An alternate route off of Longhorn.

trails.name: Leap Frog
trails.summary: Great for working on technical skills. Boulders to roll up and over, 1-4 ft drops, and narrow trees.

trails.name: Rogers Pass
trails.summary: A stellar above treeline ride with views to both sides of the divide.

trails.name: Paid-in-Full
trails.summary: One of the longer trails on the mountain with a variety of challenges along the way.

trails.name: Ceran Saint Vrain #801
trails.summary: A scenic trail through the woods along the Saint Vrain Creek.

trails.name: Sidekick
trails.summary: Green, machine-cut, downhill trail.

trails.name: Eden Valley Spur Trail
trails.summary: This is an easy trail that starts with a few rocks and progresses to more flow.

trails.name: Search and Seizure
trails.summary: A burley black diamond trail with a steep pitch, rock gardens and unavoidable drops.

trails.name: Aspen Alley Trail #342A
trails.summary: Singletrack surrounded by Aspens with a section of rollers, jumps, and berms - the best new trail in Boulder County!

trails.name: Staunton Ranch Trail
trails.summary: A short trek to access Staunton's back trails.

trails.name: Lakeshore Perimeter
trails.summary: Perimeter ride of the Frisco Peninsula along the shore of Dillon Reservoir.

trails.name: New Santa Fe Regional Trail
trails.summary: A regional access trail that parallels Interstate 25 from Palmer Lake to northern Colorado Springs.

trails.name: Plymouth Creek Trail
trails.summary: The main trail connecting you to the Red Mesa and Plymouth Mountain loops higher up in the park.

trails.name: Dedisse Trail
trails.summary: A good trail that has some decent climbs and descents.

trails.name: Spruce Creek Trail
trails.summary: Fast and fun through forest and ponds.

trails.name: Lookout Mountain Trail
trails.summary: Lookout Mountain Trail

trails.name: Red Tail
trails.summary: An intermediate ride down Copper Mountain.

trails.name: Switzerland Trail
trails.summary: Easy riding through fantastic scenery and interesting history.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - No problems riding north from sugarloaf trailhead. What a view, riding above the clouds!

trails.name: Free Speech
trails.summary: Fun for Intermediates and Experts, Free Speech has confidence building features and great flow.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - Dusty but great day with Brett and Aaron

trails.name: Bergen Peak Trail
trails.summary: A rocky sustained climb.

trails.name: Betty's Trail
trails.summary: A wonderful singletrack alternative to French Gulch Road climb to Gold Run Road.

trails.name: Atomic Janitor
trails.summary: New downhill flow trail built by the ski area.
trails.conditionDetails: Closed due to Pali lift construction, does not appear to be reopening until after the new lift is built.

trails.name: Cottonwood
trails.summary: Playful, swooping singletrack along Bear Creek.

trails.name: Stout
trails.summary: A fun loop through open areas as well as shady, forested areas.

trails.name: Vayhinger Trail
trails.summary: Fun/flowy gradual climb up to Elder-Fehn Trail.

trails.name: Bon Scott Trail #845
trails.summary: A loose and steep singletrack with plenty of rowdy sections to keep you on your toes.

trails.name: Frontier
trails.summary: Great advanced trail that features singletrack through alternating exposed meadow and dense forest.

trails.name: Holy Roller
trails.summary: A new-school jump trail.

trails.name: Rock and Roll
trails.summary: Quick scenic trail with plenty of rocky tech. Perfect for lunch or after work.

trails.name: Pick N' Sledge
trails.summary: An alternate climb up Apex trail.

trails.name: Galena Ditch Trail
trails.summary: A fun trail on historic mining waterworks.

trails.name: Buchanan Pass Trail #910
trails.summary: A remote trail ending at the Indian Peaks Wilderness.

trails.name: Rawhide Trail
trails.summary: A nice flow trail with several challenging rocky sections and some nice drops, expect two hike-a-bike sections.

trails.name: Red Mesa Loop
trails.summary: Singletrack with great views of the south Denver metro area.

trails.name: Vail Pass to Copper Bike Path
trails.summary: A great tourist shuttle ride, or a great workout.

trails.name: Strawberry Jam
trails.summary: A great flow trail and introduction to downhill mountain biking.

trails.name: The Boulevard
trails.summary: The "original" Winter Park downhill track descending 1,600 feet through a wide variety of terrain.

trails.name: Homestead Trail
trails.summary: Some rocks and roots, but another nice and easy intermediate option.

trails.name: Ranch View Trail
trails.summary: Starting from the Wild Iris Loop this trail crosses Evergreen Heights Dr.

trails.name: Game Trail
trails.summary: A Breckenridge original singletrack

trails.name: Wheelers Way
trails.summary: A great loop with awesome descents in either direction.

trails.name: Copper to Frisco Bike Path
trails.summary: An excellent component of the Summit County Recreation Path.

trails.name: Wellington Trail
trails.summary: A neighborhood connector that bypasses a busy section of French Gulch Road.

trails.name: Sherwood Gulch
trails.summary: Fast, narrow singletrack that flows through the forest and meadows near Nederland, CO.

trails.name: Bear Arms
trails.summary: Get your techy descent whoops here as Bear Arms presents riders with continuous rock/root features.
trails.conditionDetails: Dry - Dusty but great day with Brett and Aaron

trails.name: Hank's Hideaway
trails.summary: An excellent option on the lower half of Vail mountain.

trails.name: Snake River Rec Path
trails.summary: A fun and scenic cruise along the Dillon Reservoir and Snake River.

trails.name: Devil's Elbow
trails.summary: A nice little loop with some great views and interesting riding.

trails.name: Bowmans Shortcut
trails.summary: Spectacular scenery & great singletrack make this a great short ride and part of several big rides.

trails.name: Moonstone Trail
trails.summary: Gateway to the Town of Breckenridge trail network.

trails.name: Magic Forest
trails.summary: Surpisingly fun downhill trail with small features.

trails.name: Old Ski Run Trail
trails.summary: This technical treasure atop Meyer Ranch touts excellent flow, a plethora of line choices, and airtime if you wish!

trails.name: Wildcat Mountain Trail
trails.summary: Great views of the South Metro and the Front Range from atop Wildcat Mountain.

trails.name: Sunset Pink
trails.summary: A new (2014) section of singletrack with some fun, expert rock features (optional).

trails.name: Cheyenne Rim Trail
trails.summary: You can ride your bike all the way to Wyoming and back!

trails.name: Mad Hatter
trails.summary: Nice, fast, and curvy singletrack.

trails.name: Froot Loop
trails.summary: This trail is like Salad Bowl West with some big drops.
trails.conditionDetails: Fallen Trees - Some trees down, but fun downhill, no signage, so route finding is tough.

trails.name: Tie Hack Trail #659
trails.summary: This fun, flowy trail starts on Thompson Park Road and ends 2.5 miles later at the trailhead on County Road 18.

trails.name: Soda Creek Trail
trails.summary: Beautiful easy singletrack with amazing views and varied terrain.

trails.name: Fred's Lunch
trails.summary: A non-technical, mellow ride with great flowers and views.

trails.name: Elk Alley
trails.summary: A fun and fairly smooth downhill ride from the top of American Eagle lift.
